WaistKneeling.name: Kneeling Abdominal Stretch
WaistKneeling.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat with hips straight. Place hands on back of hips
WaistKneeling.execution: Lean torso back by arching back. Hold stretch.

WaistProne.name: Lying (Prone) Abdominal Stretch
WaistProne.preparation: Lie prone on mat or floor. Position hands on floor to sides of shoulders.
WaistProne.execution: Push torso up keeping pelvis on floor. Hold stretch.
WaistProne.comments: For beginners or those with less flexibility, position forearms on floor. Arms can also be positioned somewhat bent as an intermediate version of this stretch. Also known as Cobra pose in yoga.

WaistSupine.name: Lying (supine) Abdominal Stretch
WaistSupine.preparation: Lie supine on mat or floor with arms extended overhead and legs straight.
WaistSupine.execution: Lift chest away from lower body while reach away with arms. Hold stretch.
WaistSupine.comments: The lying (supine) stretch may be more appropriate for certain populations than other more advanced abdominal stretches .

WaistStanding.name: Standing Abdominal Stretch
WaistStanding.execution: Arch back by lift chest up and bringing arms back as far as possible. Hold stretch.
